title: Why were Diem's strategic hamlets unpopular with the peasants? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's the same as the Reconcentrado Policy implemented by Spain during the Cuban Insurgency. You might know it by its English name. Concentration camps originated during the Second Boer War. It was meant to deprive the guerillas of food & recruits. There are a lot of things that could go wrong while implementing this policy. You lost the war either way. British concentration camps - Wikipedia Strategic Hamlet Program - Wikipedia
